Jhor the Bleeder was an enchanted bastard sword that caused profuse bleeding when it struck a person or creature.
The sword possessed a +2 enchantment. The wounds it inflicted would not heal properly as the sword itself prevented blood from clotting.
Jhor was wielded by Ho Mang, a skilled torturer who served various royal courts across Faer√ªn. At some point it was stolen by its previous owner and eventually taken to the city of Athkatla. 
As of the , Jhor was available for sale within the Adventurer Mart.
